altername_name: Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse
Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse
name: Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse
overview: It's the game that's got everyone talking! Join Mickey on this incredible, action-packed journey through 25 graphically stunning levels. It's the greatest game play ever for the greatest Disney character of all time. You and Mickey will meet a host of hilarious and sometimes formidable characters from six of Mickey's best-loved animated features, including Steamboat Willie, The Mad Doctor, Moose Hunters, Lonesome Ghosts, Mickey and the Beanstalk and The Prince and the Pauper. Through the magic of Disney's animators, these six animated features have been brought to life in the form of an interactive game that's destined to be a family classic in the true Disney tradition.
